sentences.en: a hitherto unknown species of moth
sentences.cn: 迄今仍属未知种类的蛾

sentences.en: a species of insect previously unknown to science
sentences.cn: 科学上以前尚未了解的一种昆虫

sentences.en: Given patience, successful breeding of this species can be achieved.
sentences.cn: 只要有耐心，是能成功培育出这一品种的。

sentences.en: Hybridising the two species will reduce the red to orange.
sentences.cn: 将这两个物种杂交后颜色会由红色淡化成橙色。

sentences.en: Most species live off aquatic snails.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数种类以吃螺为生。
熊猫以及其他濒危物种
大熊猫是一种濒危物种。

sentences.en: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.cn: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.en: Several other sub-species of gull are found in the region.
sentences.cn: 在该地区还发现了海鸥的其他亚种。

sentences.en: Some animal and plant species cannot accommodate to the rapidly changing cond-itions.
sentences.cn: 某些种类的动植物不能适应迅速变化的环境。

sentences.en: some of the rare species that inhabit the area
sentences.cn: 生活在这个地区的一些罕见物种

sentences.en: The area now attracts over 60 species of breeding birds.
sentences.cn: 这一地区现在吸引了60多种鸟类到此繁育后代。

sentences.en: The book described the adaptation of desert species to the hot conditions.
sentences.cn: 这本书描绘了沙漠物种对炎热环境的适应.

sentences.en: The disease can spread from one mammalian species to another.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病能够在不同的哺乳类物种之间传播。

sentences.en: the evolution of the human species
The male of the species is almost indistinguishable from the female.
sentences.cn: 这个物种的雄性和雌性几乎无法分辨。

sentences.en: There are over 35 000 species of orchid distributed throughout the world.
sentences.cn: 有35,000多种兰花分布在世界各地.

trans.tran_cn: 物种，种类，类型，[逻辑] 个体
trans.tran_en: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants
